title: Molly Moon's Hypnotic Time Travel Adventure
description: Molly Moon meets . . . Molly Moon? In this third book in the wildly popular New York Times bestselling series, mesmerizing orphan Molly Moon and her fabulous pug, Petula, are off to India, where they discover a new twist in the potential power of time travel! With the book available in trade paperback for the first time, readers can experience Mollyâ€™s adventure in an edition perfectly suited for time travel.
author: Georgia Byng
